Package com.egehurturk.core

Class BaseServer.ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
com.egehurturk.core.BaseServer.ConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
BaseServer
public static class BaseServer.ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Manager class for handling Socket object client. Any Socket object that is accepted by ServerSocket is passed into this class by constructor.

One convenient way to use this class is creating an infinite loop inside the method that constructs this class, and passes the Socket client in the constructor.

The subclass of the BaseServer class should have an inner class that handles the management of client, possibly named ConnectionManager and extends this base class

Implements the Runnable interface and a run method for making the server threaded. Every work that is done inside the run method executes in another Thread.
